17_1H5UJ7LneToGqYqJ9fbLnu1Ko2pxTpchof.body:
Yes, they can and probably are linked. When you create a ZeroID you send a request to `zeronet.io` to request your signature to be signed.
The owner of the server, or web hosting service can link the IP address with the username.

11_1H5UJ7LneToGqYqJ9fbLnu1Ko2pxTpchof.body: Because of the network effect. People are social beings, they want to belong somewhere.
